Zicheng Pan

Research Fellow
Griffith University



About

I am a Research Fellow in the School of Engineering and Built Environment at Griffith University, Australia. I completed my PhD at Griffith University in 2025, where my research focused on deep learning and computer vision. Prior to my doctoral studies, I earned a combined Bachelor of Engineering (Honours) and Master of Engineering in Electrical Engineering from the University of Queensland in 2021. I am recently working on these areas:

  • Incremental Learning
  • Domain Adaptation
  • Fine-grained Classification
  • Vision-Language Models
  • Large-Language Models

ðŸŽ“ Multiple PhD positions available in Computer Vision and Machine Learning (Feb/Jul 2026 intake). Interested candidates are encouraged to contact me with their CV and research interests.
